Blank Embrace.title: elixir
Blank Embrace.about:
Welcome.



Today you will go to the ancient forest, to the old herbalist's hut.





:ELIXIR:



1. Fades - dreamy, simple, light.



You enter under the shade of thousand-year-old branches, and slowly make your way through fallen branches and dense bushes.

The sun is slowly going down.



2. Nature Pulse - warm, soothing, sparkling.



You enter a huge field, you look around everywhere, and it seems to you endless. The grass, bright and sparkling in the sun, quietly rustles, shimmering with colors. In the distance, you see the herbalist's hut you've heard so much about.



3. Grains Of Ethereal Touch - mysterious, multi-part, nocturnal.



You reach your destination in deep twilight. There are only flashes of fireflies and the strong smell of meadow grasses all around. You knock on the door of the hut, and an old man opens the door for you. You look at him and do not understand whether you like him or not. There is something about him ... strange.

You communicate with him for a long time about life, about your goals and aspirations, and it seems that you yourself find the answer to many questions. The old man, on the other hand, cooks a pleasantly smelling decoction in his tin cauldron. A little later, you sit with him on a stump at the entrance to the house and drink a magic elixir.



4. Meditative Running - calm, fast, meditative.



You are enjoying the taste of herbs and such a pleasant listener as an old herbalist. The full moon rises in the sky to the chirping of cicadas.

Chuckling, the old man offers to go jogging with him. You look at him like he's crazy. A dark night, there are only kilometers of empty forest around. But you don't answer, you just finish your elixir.

The old man, groaning, rises from his stump, and with a whistle, he slaps you on the back. At the same moment, you realize that you are standing in the sky, and at the top is the same hut. You look at the herbalist, but he just smiles and invites you to run again. Despite all the absurdity of what is happening, you accept the offer because it seems so natural to you. You run across the star-studded sky and feel incredibly well.



5. Watch The Moon - wondering, happy, lonely (?).



Covered from above by fields and vast thickets, you continue your journey forward into the unknown with an elderly herbalist. You run and run, you don't feel tired. On the contrary, your strength seems to grow with each new step. You want to know the destination of your trip.



You look back at the herbalist, but he predicts your question, and silently nods towards the immensely huge moon.



You nod back and continue on your way. Way to the moon?



Everything is getting so harsh .. and ..



You wake up on warm soft moss. In some unknown way, you found yourself in the same place where you entered the forest.

It was getting light, but the moon still stood out brightly in the sky.



What was this path? Path to the moon?



Or a path to yourself?







P.S.

Thank you, herbalist.

Hello my beloved ones!



Today I will continue to share with you the compositions that helped me with my anxiety. I'm sure they will help you too.





They are simple, touching and magical.





Relax and plunge into the depths of your subconscious mind.

Blank Embrace.title: mysterious falls
Blank Embrace.about:
Hi my dear friends!



I want to celebrate this weekend with the release of simple and enchanting sounds.



Deep, unobtrusive, warm and dark, they will envelop you and send you on a magical journey through your inner self.



Together with these tracks, you will walk along rickety mountain paths, descend to the gorge, enjoy the splashes of the waterfall of your mind and feel what you need to feel.





Enjoy your listening.

Blank Embrace.title: outer worlds
Blank Embrace.about:
Welcome!

Today we will go on a journey to other worlds, outer worlds.

Relax and focus, pleasure and dreamy trip ahead!









 :OUTER WORLDS:



1. No Rush - sweet, melancholic and patient. 



After passing through the portal, you are in no hurry. You pass among weird plants and flowers. Above your head is an unknown sky and unknown constellations. But you're good.



2. Not Alone - tribal, juicy and meditative.



You walk down the mountain and meet strangers. It looks like they are going to celebrate something and invite you to their ritual. You are sitting next to a huge bonfire and around you there are flashes of fire, spicy aromas, the sound of drums and dancing persons. It's starting to rain.



3. Little Things - dreamy, sleepy and cozy.



You were well received by the people of the tribe. Three moons light up the sky and night falls.

The most important of them, it seems, the leader, accompanies you to your place to sleep. You look at a tall tree, hung with hanging hammocks for sleeping, the tree stands out very brightly against the background of multi-colored moons and distant flashes of heavenly radiance. Bowing to the leader, you climb the tree and make yourself comfortable. It's time for a warm sleep.



4. Outer Worlds - iriscendet, crystal and ethereal.



It looks like there is something in the air of this world. The dream into which you plunged is unlike anything you have previously seen. Bright, soft, sharp, vague, hot and cold, sad and joyful images rush in your mind. Nevertheless, it brings you a unique experience and you feel a warm nostalgia for the times that were and did not exist. In the end, you fall into cozy darkness.



5. Straightforward - evocative, thrill and enigmatic.



You wake up to distant rumbling sounds. The hammock on which you sleep has long been dilapidated, and the settlement in which you spent your time yesterday looks long abandoned. You go down in bewilderment and start walking along the only ungrown path. Strange rhythmic sounds surround you, and something shines in front of you. But you don't feel fear, just curiosity. In the end, the path leads you to a brightly shining portal, and you succumb to an inner impulse, step into it, and everything around begins to dissolve and distort.

Top and bottom change places, warm light surrounds you and attracts you somewhere.

The light is getting brighter and the sounds are getting dimmer.



You seem to be entering the next outer world.





P.S.



Blank Embrace project updates very soon!

Blank Embrace.title: warlock
Blank Embrace.about:
Greetings, friends!



Today we are continuing this series of drones from anxiety.



At this point, we will go deeper to allow our subconscious to work.



Stay focused and inspired by the cover art and song titles, and lie back. Close your eyes and start listening to the subtle changes in the soundscape.



Over time, your mind will fill the picture properly, and later your heart will join the mind.



Take your time and try to be neutral, if not positive.



Thank you all from the bottom of my heart and wish you a great weekend.

trackinfo.title: there are still many miles ahead // we don't need to rush

Blank Embrace.title: beautiful pieces
Blank Embrace.about:
Hi guys! I came back to you with a new album, it's raw and organic mixtape including vibrant mood and warm feelings.



I have not been with you for a long time and I am glad that I returned.



Thank you for the support you gave me even when I wasn’t releasing new music.



Later I will tell you about why I produce my ambient music, and then, I think, you will understand a lot.



Enjoy your listening!

A few sweet and warm tracks for all of you, beloved friends.



During this difficult time, stay home, take care of your health.



Listen to relaxing music and think again about how beautiful life and nature are.



Appreciate that, yourself and your loved ones.



Everything will be fine. Forever and ever.

Blank Embrace.title: i wish i was there
Blank Embrace.about:
Exactly 7 tracks of fluttering memories.



Recently I've been going through my stuff, and I came across an old, dusty kodak film. 



It captures live moments of events that I seem to have already forgotten. 



It was a magical and slightly sad moment. 



The events of the past years are already in the distant past, the past that is covered with haze. 



But on the tape, they remained forever clear, as if it were yesterday.

Blank Embrace.title: we should have stayed there
Blank Embrace.about:
Dear friends.



I am extremely proud and happy to present you this 300th anniversary album.



It can be said that this is a kind of a certain milestone for me, I moved away from my usual drone sound and.. here it is. Lingering choral drone paintings are decorated with elegant, sometimes rough, but enchanting beautiful interlacing synthesizers and lo-fi drums. 



The album pursues the theme of duality. Dark and light, sadness and happiness, grief and joy. 



I do not hesitate to say that all the songs in the album are dedicated to only one person. In those incredibly bright and colorful moments that we lived together. It was a special time, full of sweet oblivion.





I turn with warmth and love to my memories of those sincere journeys through the fields of our souls.





But it ends one way or another, and though I have lost it, lost it forever, ruined it all myself, I remain happy and grateful to her.







You'll always be a part of me.







Each of you had moments when you were left with nothing. Everyone has their own unique features, which are hard to live with. But I believe in you, in each and every one of you. 



Because everything is as it should be. You're the best people on the planet and I'm glad you're here with me.

Blank Embrace.title: I lost the one person who is dearest to me.
Blank Embrace.about:
To be honest, I have not been so bad for a long time.

Everything happened just as if the sinister reaper cut down all the good things that I cultivated.



Sometimes it gets easier for me, but then it comes back with new powers. I am constantly overwhelmed by those bright, warm, pleasant-smelling, magical, charming, insanely touching and delicate memories that I cannot cope with.



I do not hold on to this man. I take no offence. It’s just that I’m mad, madly, madly sorry that this is all over, that there will no longer be these secret and foolish lessons that exist only for us.



That I won't be able to wake up next to this person. I can not grumble at something and know that they tolerate me and still appreciate.



God, friends, it's so hard for me.



I can not cope with it, it's even worse than when my relative died, no matter how terrible it sounds.



But I feel I am not going to pretend to be guilty for that.



Please, how can I cope.



Have you all watched Good Will Hunting?

There was a heartfelt dialogue between Will and his psychotherapist. About how close people can be, in particular, his wife and himself.



His wife died of cancer, like my mother, but my person just left.







I can't live.

Thank you for being with me.

Blank Embrace.title: Feel So Bad
Blank Embrace.about:
Addiction is a brain disorder characterized by compulsive engagement in rewarding stimuli despite adverse consequences.



Despite the involvement of a number of psychosocial factors, a biological process – one which is induced by repeated exposure to an addictive stimulus – is the core pathology that drives the development and maintenance of an addiction.



The two properties that characterize all addictive stimuli are that they are reinforcing (i.e., they increase the likelihood that a person will seek repeated exposure to them) and intrinsically rewarding (i.e., they are perceived as being inherently positive, desirable, and pleasurable).

Blank Embrace.title: forsaken
Blank Embrace.about:
Summer is the hottest of the four temperate seasons, falling after spring and before autumn. At the summer solstice, the days are longest and the nights are shortest, with day-length decreasing as the season progresses after the solstice. The date of the beginning of summer varies according to climate, tradition and culture. When it is summer in the Northern Hemisphere, it is winter in the Southern Hemisphere, and vice versa.







I just love summer.

Bright Static Shine
Blank Embrace.about:
Hello friends!



This album contains tracks that describe the whole stages of my life.



Rises, falls, moments of true enthusiasm, moments of great depression and alienation.



All that is familiar to you and all people on our planet.



I hope this release sinks deep in your heart, and you will feel connected with the world and the universe.



Thank you.







______________________________

CD's will be shipping after 07/26/2018

Blank Embrace.title: Galaxxy Bubble
Blank Embrace.about:
Ощущение одиночества и забвения сменяются умиротворением и принятием себя.



Мрачные каскады серо-черных туч сгущаются над лесом и поглощают все вокруг метр за метром.



Спаси.

Blank Embrace.title: Hiraeth
Blank Embrace.about:
И в вечности страданий мы обретаем себя.

Солнце, льющееся в панорамное окно мягким светом расчерчивает грубые углы.



Любовь.

Blank Embrace.title: Fury of the Spirit
Blank Embrace.about:
The most merciful thing in the world, I think, is the inability of the human mind to correlate all its contents. We live on a placid island of ignorance in the midst of black seas of infinity, and it was not meant that we should voyage far. The sciences, each straining in its own direction, have hitherto harmed us little; but some day the piecing together of dissociated knowledge will open up such terrifying vistas of reality, and of our frightful position therein, that we shall either go mad from the revelation or flee from the deadly light into the peace and safety of a new dark age.



Howard Phillips Lovecraft.
